member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for user wallet operations. User wallet is required to purchase NFT items

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule.IsUserHavePrimaryWalletAsync
member.summary: Checks if the user already created primary wallet The primary wallet is needed for NFT virtual items purchase
member.returns: true if the primary wallet exists, otherwise false

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Wallets.WalletsModule.CreateWalletAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates user wallet. Right now it is possible to create just one wallet per user
member.returns: Information of the create operation was successful.
